name: #AustroVienna
description: My tour is designed to meet the need of easy travellers, who come to discover this amazing cities for a weekend or a couple of days. During this walk, I will unveil you some features of this city, information related both to history and art. My tour is perfect whether you are a student or a businessman, whether you are a couple or a group of friends. I will make my best to make you breath the real essence of this city.
